name: Stopwatch
body:
# StopWatch - The jQuery timer ## It's a jQuery plug-in. :) *** # API Documentations: ## Initilization 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch();`
## Initilization with options 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch( { 'format': 'MM:SS' } );`
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch( { 'format': 'HH:MM:SS' } );`
## Start timer 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch('start');`
## Stop timer 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch('stop');`
## Reset timer 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch('reset');`
## Get taken time 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch('timetaken');`
## Callbacks onStart, onStop and onRest 
`$('.stopwatch').stopWatch( {`
    `'format': 'MM:SS',`
    `'onStart': function(){`
        `alert('Called on onstart');`
     `},`
    `'onStop' : function(){`
        `alert('Called on onstop');`
     `},`
    `'onReset': function(){`
        `alert('Called on onreset');`
     `},`
`} );`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
